help-file.title: TITLES
help-file.content:
Duris is a fantasy based mud and as such we expect the players to have fantasy based titles, if they have them at all. What a proper title is might be different for most but there are some basics.
-Do not use foul language -Do not use racial slurs -Keep it in character
Duris may not be a role-play mud but that does not mean we don't work hard to try to cultivate a good fantasy feeling while online. Any title that breaks this is considered a bad title and may be subject to change. If guild ranks are out of line the guild is subject to be disbanded.
